Importing and checking the data
```{r }
data<-read.csv('F:/Downloads/Performance Index.csv')
head(data)
```
Check for any missing values
```{r }
sum(is.na(data))
```

Preparing the data for model deployement and deploy the model
```{r }
#We left out empid as it not relevant to our linear model naturally
data=data.frame(data)
data$empid<-NULL

#Model Deployement
datamodel<-lm(jpi~.,data = data)
summary(datamodel)

```
As we can see tol is not really relevant in building the linear regression model
So we omit it out

```{r }
#Model Deployement
datamodel1<-lm(jpi~aptitude+technical+general,data = data)
summary(datamodel1)

```
